China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 3 月 7 日星期四 10:54:21 GMT 120
Sanctioned tanker Liteyny Prospect docks in China to offload Russian oilThe sanctioned Russian oil tanker Liteyny Prospect has docked at the Chinese port of Huanghua, near the city of Cangzhou in Hebei province, to discharge its 700,000-barrel cargo of Russian Sokol crude, according to two sources familiar with the matter. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 08:20:19 GMT JULOWZJ3PVLUTDAQ6K236FAPYU https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/sanctioned-tanker-liteyny-prospect-docks-china-offload-Russian-oil-2024-03-07/Reuters商业活力
Bullish positions on Indian rupee at over two-year high; Asian FX bears hold ground: Reuters pollBullish bets on the Indian rupee firmed most in two-and-a-half years, while investors maintained bearish positions across most Asian currencies amid uncertainty over China's economic recovery and a protracted global monetary easing timeline, a Reuters poll found on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 07:47:38 GMT S2WEFTRA6BKFJLRSLTIOBX3F3I https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/bullish-positions-indian-rupee-over-two-year-high-asian-fx-bears-hold-ground-2024-03-07/Echha Jain市场货币
Trying to contain China will only fuel its grievances, says Malaysian PMAttempts to contain China's rise would only aggravate the country and sow discord in the region, Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said during a speech in Australia on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 07:38:46 GMT PGGDQLHQRZIKZLRYBJUBITW7DM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/trying-to-contain-china-will-only-fuel-its-grievances-says-malaysian-pm-2024-03-07/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
Japan says it is gravely concerned about closer military ties between China and RussiaJapan's top government spokesperson said on Thursday that Tokyo was gravely concerned about closer military cooperation between China and Russia in light of security for Japan as well as for the region. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 07:24:31 GMT MHOJDHT6NROMDFBN6YHLV6ABOM https://www.reuters.com/world/japan-says-it-is-gravely-concerned-about-closer-military-ties- Between-china-2024-03-07/Reuters世界
As Big Tech scrambles to meet EU rules, investigations seen as likelyFrom overhauling online platforms to backroom engineering, Google, Apple, Amazon, Microsoft, Meta and TikTok owner ByteDance have scrambled over the last six months to comply with landmark EU tech rules that come into force on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 06:03:36 GMT ODOBF6XGWVLMBE5US5MQVFYAEU https://www.reuters.com/technology/big-tech-scrambles-meet-eu-rules-investigations-likely-seen-2024-03-07/Foo Yun Chee可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Russia can fight on in Ukraine for at least two years, Lithuania saysHigh oil prices, sanctions evasion and state investment are providing Russia with enough resources to fight on in Ukraine at the current intensity for at least two more years, Lithuanian intelligence agencies said in a report on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 05:34:57 GMT T53S4ZN6FFKLPFPWA6BER2OKHA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-can-fight-ukraine-ateast-two-years-lihuania-says-2024-03-07/Andrius Sytas技术网络安全
Hong Kong judges dismiss appeal in sedition case for pro-democracy radio hostThree Hong Kong High Court judges on Thursday rejected an appeal by pro-democracy activist Tam Tak-chi against his conviction and 40 month sentence on charges which included 7 sedition offences. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 03:54:23 GMT 6VHUYFKM2JKD7JBIIGONHQNZXY https://www.reuters.com/world/hong-kong-judges-dismiss-appeal-sedition-case-pro-democracy-radio-host-2024-03-07/Jessie Pang世界
China's exports top forecasts as global demand returnsChina's export and import growth in the January-February period beat forecasts, suggesting global trade is turning a corner in an encouraging signal for policymakers as they try to shore up a stuttering economic recovery. China's Jan-Feb exports rise 7.1%, imports grow 3.5%, beating forecastsChina's exports during the January-February period rose 7.1% year-on-year, while imports increased 3.5%, with both figures beating forecasts, customs data showed on Thursday. China to offer visa-free travel to travellers from six countriesChina will offer visa-free travel to nationals from Switzerland, Ireland, Hungary, Austria, Belgium and Luxembourg from March 14, foreign minister Wang Yi said on Thursday.
